short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extract colors easily from anywhere with color grabber tool.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: No matter on which webpage you are, grab your desired color on the spot with this simple Color Grabber tool. Select the element and it'll tell you the hex code of the selected color. Or select your desired color from the color panel inside the tool.
